title: dgomes
author: dgomes
content: Hello everyone,I am Daniel, I am excited to announce the launch of our new web application, designed to assist cryptocurrency traders and investors.CryptoView.io is a Crypto Market Scanner and Alert platform that allows you to quickly scan analyzed markets, identify the best trending markets with the highest trading volumes, and stay informed everywhere with our customizable alerts.Our platform offers a unique volumetric analysis to immediately spot volume discrepancies between buys and sells per period and reference currency. It also provides an "All In One" view on a crypto market, on 4 time scales, with all the indicators to enter or exit a position at the best time.CryptoView.io also stands out for its customizable alerts by price, RSI, volume, price explosion, and RSI explosion. This way, you can never miss an investment opportunity and optimize your trading strategies.By using our platform, you can scan thousands of real-time crypto markets and get a clear view of the most promising market opportunities. Our technology captures and analyzes hundreds of thousands of transactions per second, scrutinizing every corner of the market to find the most profitable trades for you.Finally, we have made reliability and stability our priorities. Our proven tools work non-stop, 24/7, providing you with up-to-date and accurate information at all times. Our data comes directly from the world's largest trading platform, ensuring perfect accuracy over different time periods down to the minute.We are thrilled to introduce this new platform and look forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions. Feel free to ask questions or share comments. We are here to help and make your crypto trading experience as smooth and profitable as possible.Thank you for your attention,Daniel - www.CryptoView.iohttps://app.cryptoview.io/img/features/pres1-cryptoview.jpg

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Honestly, three days of the trial version sounds too short to get a broad picture of the possibilities of your tool. Events in trading can sometimes be consequential and a sample of three days may not show full functionality (if everything written on the site is really so).Maybe you could offer a longer trial period, a month for example, or some partially limited version, a limited number of alerts per day, for example.Through a short search, I was unable to find any significant references or adequate feedback about your service, perhaps the priority should be to familiarize potential users with the platform first. Or maybe I'm wrong.

comments.author: dgomes
comments.body: Hello, and thank you for your message.It's completely understandable that you haven't found any reviews for our web application yet. Indeed, the project has only been online for two weeks, which explains the lack of feedback so far.Our current challenge is to make our application known to as many people as possible. An initial version was launched in 2018, but we quickly realized that certain aspects needed to be improved. So, we paused the project to take into account the feedback from our first users and refine our offering.Today, we are pleased to present a revised version of our application, which we hope is more in line with our customers' expectations. To allow you to discover its potential, we offer a free three-day trial. This is a relatively short period, but we believe it's enough to give you an idea of what our tool can bring to you. Of course, we remain open to your feedback and are ready to adjust our strategy if necessary.One of the major novelties of this version is the ability to customize all the tools according to your preferences. We are aware that each trader has their own habits and we don't want to impose ours. That's why we've made sure that our application can adapt to you, not the other way around.If our roadmap seems promising, we invite you to take advantage of the free three-day trial. To do so, you will need to enter your credit card information, but rest assured, no fees will be charged without your consent. Once on the application, you can cancel your plan at any time from the settings of your account. If you decide not to cancel at the end of the three-day trial, know that you can always end your subscription later. Only the current month will be billed, as there is no duration commitment.Finally, I would like to highlight that we have integrated Stripe, the global leader in electronic payment, to ensure the security of your transactions. Our application is thus available in 20 different currencies.We hope you will give our application a chance and we look forward to hearing your feedback.

comments.author: dgomes
comments.body: I understand you're wondering why we ask for your credit card information even before the trial period. Allow me to explain.We use "Stripe Checkout" to handle our transactions and subscriptions. It is Stripe, not us, that manages your credit card details. This means we don't have access to this information, enhancing the security of your data. When you enter your credit card information, it allows Stripe to manage your subscription more efficiently.In fact, with Stripe, you have the ability to change your subscription plan at any time, whether to upgrade or downgrade according to your needs. This flexibility is a key advantage of using Stripe Checkout.Asking for credit card details before the trial period is a common practice for online subscription services. This facilitates a smooth transition from the trial period to the paid subscription, if you choose to continue using the service.We chose to implement this solution as it provided the best balance of security, convenience, and flexibility for our users. We don't have the ability to change this requirement, as it is intrinsic to how Stripe Checkout operates.I hope this explanation clarifies your concerns. If you have further questions or concerns, please let us know.
